intro: Pagella, commonly known as the common pagella, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is native to Europe and parts of Asia, often found in grassy areas and along roadsides. The plant features slender stems with finely divided leaves that resemble those of other umbelliferous species. Its flowers are small and clustered in umbels, typical of the carrot family. Pagella is valued for its aromatic properties and has been used in traditional herbal medicine.
